main: Gilles told me of a ritual that would strip this world of demonic energy.
He did, did he? What a meddlesome bastard.
You're serious, aren't you? You realize any such ritual would strip you into nothingness as well, right?
You would die. Are you seriously okay with that?
But you don't believe in the future of demonkind? Sorry boss, but I can't cosign this.
I don't know what ideas the Blue have put in that head of yours, but I simply can't just stand here knowing what you intend to do.
I'd sincerely hoped it would never have to come to this, my champion.
